name: There is no plant B.
description:
This is my entry for the Ludum Dare #46 Compo. Theme: Keep it alive.

Keep your plant alive until the timer runs out.
Stand near the plant water it.

Stand near a puddle to get water.

Brown fences can be moved. You can only carry one fence at a time.

Controls
Move: WASD / Arrows
Pick up/Drop fence: Z / N
Shoo Rabbits: X / M Quit: Esc
